PepsiCo has unveiled a range of new self - serve equipment for dispensing drinks in places such as restaurants , cinemas and cafes .

Called Spire , it is Pepsi 's answer to Coca - Cola 's Freestyle , a new kind of drink dispenser that jolted the sleepy fountain business back into life four years ago by demonstrating that a soda machine did not have to be an ugly steel box with eight valves and an ice maker .
Instead , the largest model of Spire looks a lot like a giant iPhone .

Soda fountains in pharmacies and apothecaries , where this all started , were points of engagement where an amazing amount of creativity and innovation took place at the hands of the soda jerk , said Brad Jakeman , president of PepsiCo 's global beverages group .

A1: a means of introducing consumers to
RelatedSentence: With soda sales sliding in grocery and convenience stores and other retail outlets , the new equipment offers the companies a means of introducing consumers to their products - carbonated or not - in a playful way .
